author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Retrieves the Access Control List of an object.
commands.name: gcs-list-bucket-object-policy

commands.description: Removes an entity from a bucket's Access Control List.
commands.name: gcs-delete-bucket-policy

commands.description:
Adds a new entity to a bucket's Access Control List.
Note: use the gcs-put-bucket-policy command to update an existing entry.
commands.name: gcs-create-bucket-policy

commands.description: Copies a file (object) from one bucket to another.
commands.name: gcs-copy-file

commands.description: Uploads a file (object) into a bucket.
commands.name: gcs-upload-file

commands.description: Blocks public access to a specified Google Cloud Storage bucket by enabling public access prevention, ensuring only authorized users can access the bucket.
commands.name: gcs-block-public-access-bucket

commands.description: Removes an entity from an object's Access Control List.
commands.name: gcs-delete-bucket-object-policy

commands.description:
Updates an existing entity in a bucket's Access Control List.
Note: use the gcs-create-bucket-policy command to create a new entry.
commands.name: gcs-put-bucket-policy

commands.description:
Updates an existing entity in an object's Access Control List.
Note: use gcs-create-bucket-object-policy command to create a new entry.
commands.name: gcs-put-bucket-object-policy

commands.description: Retrieves the Access Control List of a bucket.
commands.name: gcs-list-bucket-policy

commands.description: Retrieves object data into a file.
commands.name: gcs-download-file

commands.description:
Adds a new entity to an object's Access Control List.
Note: use the gcs-put-bucket-object-policy command to update an existing entry.
commands.name: gcs-create-bucket-object-policy

commands.description: Retrieves the list of objects in a bucket.
commands.name: gcs-list-bucket-objects

integration.description: Google Cloud Storage is a RESTful online file storage web service for storing and accessing data on Google Cloud Platform infrastructure.
integration.name: Google Cloud Storage

description: Google Cloud Storage is a RESTful online file storage web service for storing and accessing data on Google Cloud Platform infrastructure.
name: Google Cloud Storage
